title: Guards; concurrent employment
context: ยง463-8.5 Guards; concurrent employment. No person shall engage in the business of guard when the guard work is concurrent with other duties performed under the agreement of employment or when the guard work is not the principal fact of the employment without first obtaining a license as a guard. [L 1973, c 165, ยง1; am L 1983, c 40, ยง6]
